name: Lethal Toxic Goo Dungeon
description:
In Lethal Toxic Goo Dungeon, you venture through forgotten rooms full of baddies to battle! Experiment with different guns and dash through the danger to make it to the exit, even buy some items from the one and only.... JEFF!!!

FEATURES

  • Twin stick action inspired by the days of Smash TV.
  • Randomized roguelike dungeons making each run different .
  • 5 elaborate juicy guns from rocket launchers to shotguns.
  • Buy heals and guns from the famous LTGD icon JEFF!
  • High scores to beat and improve.

HOW FAR INTO THE DUNGEON CAN YOU GET?
